attributes.action: save St Barnabas church of England primary school
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I hope to try and save mine and other peoples childrens school from closure. It has recently been found out that our daughters school may close and we do not wish it to.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "save St Barnabas church of England primary school."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17309


Prime Minister's Office
